app_about_text: Stem ZIPper version {{version}}. Manage and package your audio stems with ease.
app_max_size_tooltip: Set the target size per ZIP archive.
pack_error_invalid_max_size: Please enter a value greater than 0 and up to {{max}} MB. Resetting to {{reset}} MB.
app_drop_helper: Drop a folder anywhere in the window
app_select_hint: Drop or select a folder to begin
pack_error_disabled: Pick a folder to enable packing
dialog_open_folder_prompt: Open the folder with the created ZIP files?
dialog_overwrite_text: This folder already contains stems-*.zip files. Existing files will be overwritten. Continue?
dev_error_dev_only: Test data generation is only available in developer mode.
pack_toast_estimate: This run will likely produce â‰ˆ {{count}} ZIP archive(s).
toast_estimate_note: Estimate accounts for mono-splitting of oversize stereo WAVs and archive overhead. Final count may differ slightly.
